thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Unit GCL To Issue Up To $500 Mln Convertible Notes To Kelley Asset Holding

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's Unit GCL To Issue Up To $500 Mln Convertible Notes To Kelley Asset Holding

organizations.name: reuters) - tianjin tianhai investment co ltd

text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS UNIT GCL INVESTMENT HOLDINGS PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO $500 MILLION CONVERTIBLE NOTES TO KELLEY ASSET HOLDING LTD TO BOOST LIQUIDITY
* SAYS IT OFFERS COLLATERAL FOR GCL INVESTMENT'S NOTE ISSUE Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Fqocs2 ; bit.ly/2oJjOLf Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
